com.sunilos.common.ctl

Class SSOLoginCtl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sunilos.common.ctl.SSOLoginCtl

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value={"Auth/sso","auth/sso"})
public class SSOLoginCtl
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides SSO login api to other micro services of the Suite. Client has to specify following properties in application.properties ncs.sso.authKey: http://nenosystems.in:9092/NCSSSO/Auth/authkey ncs.sso.authlogin: http://nenosystems.in:9092/NCSSSO/Auth/authLogin/ ncs.sso.signUp: http://nenosystems.in:9092/NCSSSO/Auth/signUp ncs.app.id=1592561507957
    Author:
    Sunil Sahu
